languages.text: "...я словно вновь оказался на борту того Черного корабля, который забрал меня с родной планеты". {n}Охрипший Хейнрикс вдруг криво улыбается.{/n} "Как странно. Я сказал тебе об этом — и наваждение спало..."

"...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."
languages.original_text: "...я словно вновь оказался на борту того Черного корабля, который забрал меня с родной планеты". {n}Охрипший Хейнрикс вдруг криво улыбается.{/n} "Как странно. Я сказал тебе об этом — и наваждение спало..."

traits.locale_text: "...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."

"...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."

"...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."

"...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."

languages.text: «... era como volver a estar a bordo de la nave negra que me sacó de mi planeta natal», {n}dice entre jadeos. De pronto, te lanza una sonrisa retorcida.{/n} «Es curioso. En cuanto se lo he contado, la visión se ha disipado...».
languages.original_text: "...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."

traits.locale_text: «... era como volver a estar a bordo de la nave negra que me sacó de mi planeta natal», {n}dice entre jadeos. De pronto, te lanza una sonrisa retorcida.{/n} «Es curioso. En cuanto se lo he contado, la visión se ha disipado...».

languages.text: 「…まるで、俺を母星から連れ去った〈黒き御船〉の上に戻ったかのような感覚だった」{n}と、険しい表情で言う。そして、突然いびつな笑顔を見せた。{/n}「変だな。あなたにその話をしたら、すぐに幻覚が消えた…」
languages.original_text: "...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."

traits.locale_text: 「…まるで、俺を母星から連れ去った〈黒き御船〉の上に戻ったかのような感覚だった」{n}と、険しい表情で言う。そして、突然いびつな笑顔を見せた。{/n}「変だな。あなたにその話をしたら、すぐに幻覚が消えた…」

languages.text: “……我感觉就像是回到了那艘黑船上，背井离乡。”{n}海因里希哑着嗓子说道，随后露出了一丝苦笑。{/n}“奇怪的是，自从我和你说过那件事情之后，它的幻象就消失了……”
languages.original_text: "...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."

traits.locale_text: “……我感觉就像是回到了那艘黑船上，背井离乡。”{n}海因里希哑着嗓子说道，随后露出了一丝苦笑。{/n}“奇怪的是，自从我和你说过那件事情之后，它的幻象就消失了……”

languages.text: « ... J'ai eu l'impression d'être de retour à bord du Vaisseau Noir qui m'a arraché à ma planète natale,{n} dit-il d'une voix rauque, puis il se fend d'un sourire en coin.{/n} C'est étrange. La vision s'est dissipée au moment même où je vous en parlais... »
languages.original_text: "...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."

traits.locale_text: « ... J'ai eu l'impression d'être de retour à bord du Vaisseau Noir qui m'a arraché à ma planète natale,{n} dit-il d'une voix rauque, puis il se fend d'un sourire en coin.{/n} C'est étrange. La vision s'est dissipée au moment même où je vous en parlais... »

languages.text: "... es war, als sei ich wieder auf dem Schwarzen Schiff, das mich von meiner Heimatplaneten weggebracht hat"{n}, sagt er mit krächzender Stimme. Dann lächelt er plötzlich schief.{/n} "Merkwürdig. Ich habe Euch davon erzählt ... und die Vision ist verschwunden."
languages.original_text: "...it was like I was back aboard the Black Ship that took me away from my home planet," {n}he says with a rasp. Then he suddenly smiles crookedly.{/n} "That's strange. I told you about it — and the vision dissipated..."

traits.locale_text: "... es war, als sei ich wieder auf dem Schwarzen Schiff, das mich von meiner Heimatplaneten weggebracht hat"{n}, sagt er mit krächzender Stimme. Dann lächelt er plötzlich schief.{/n} "Merkwürdig. Ich habe Euch davon erzählt ... und die Vision ist verschwunden."
